location.street: Upper Elgon View, Bishop Muge Road off Avenue 2

insurance_products.name: Motor Vehicle Insurance
insurance_products.description: Comprehensive coverage for cars, motorcycles, and commercial vehicles. Includes third-party liability, collision damage, and theft protection.

insurance_products.name: Health Insurance
insurance_products.description: Affordable health coverage for individuals and families. Access to a wide network of hospitals and clinics across Kenya.

insurance_products.name: Property Insurance
insurance_products.description: Protect your home or business property against fire, theft, and natural disasters with our comprehensive coverage.

insurance_products.name: Business Insurance
insurance_products.description: Tailored solutions for businesses of all sizes. Coverage includes liability, goods in transit, and equipment protection.

insurance_products.name: Personal Accident Insurance
insurance_products.description: Protection against accidents with benefits for disability, hospitalization, and medical expenses.

insurance_products.name: Travel Insurance
insurance_products.description: Coverage for domestic and international travel. Includes medical emergencies, trip cancellation, and baggage protection.

seo.keywords: insurance Eldoret Kenya, health insurance, motor insurance, property insurance, travel insurance
seo.description: Sawa Insurance Agency offers comprehensive insurance coverage including motor, health, property, business, personal accident and travel insurance in Eldoret, Kenya.
seo.author: Sawa Insurance Agency
